colorMostCommonLattices

public void colorMostCommonLattices()
Color the lattice items that are most commonly used. This gives the user a visual cue.

enableOnlyCompatibleLattices

public void enableOnlyCompatibleLattices(java.lang.String ruleClassName)
Disables any lattices that are not compatible with the specified rule.

Parameters:
ruleClassName - the class name of the specified rule. Any lattices incompatible with this rule will be disabled.
